content: the little ladybug is the day 11 pattern for the spring 2024 pond pals mini amigurumi crochet along there will be a total of 12 mini amigurumi bugs birds and other animals in the crochet along the ladybug joins the dragonfly ant hummingbird worm turtle bee mallard butterfly frog and bluebird from days 1 -11 the little ladybug is about 4 long with a red shell with black spots and tiny little legs underneath little ladybug is available free at 5littlemonsters com or you can purchase the pond pals mini amigurumi ebook with all 12 patterns in an ad-free printable format
